WCAG_2_2_COMPLETE: Requirements of WCAG 2.2 applicable to PDF documents. Both machine (purely algorithmic) and human (require a human or an AI) checks. Human checks are based on the experimental heuristics and might result in false negatives.
WCAG_2_2_MACHINE: WCAG 2.2 requirements applicable to PDF documents. Only machine-verifiable (purely algorithmic) checks that do not require human interaction.
PDFUA_1: Machine-verifiable PDF/UA-1 requirements as defined by ISO 14289-1:2014 and Matterhorn protocol 1.10.
PDFUA_2: Machine-verifiable PDF/UA-2 requirements as defined by ISO 14289-2:2024 (draft) not including parent-child relationship requirements in the structure tree as defined by ISO/TS 32005:2023.
PDFUA_2_TAGGED_PDF: Machine-verifiable PDF/UA-2 requirements as defined by ISO 14289-2:2024 (draft) including parent-child relationship requirements in the structure tree as defined by ISO/TS 32005:2023.
TAGGED_PDF: Parent-child relationship requirements in the structure tree as defined by ISO/TS 32005:2023.
